DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 3 multicenter randomize , open-label , safety study assess safety repeat dose Medisorb® naltrexone 380 mg ( VIVITROL® ) administer 1 year adult alcohol and/or opioid dependence define Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Health Disorders ( DSM-IV ) criterion . Eligible subject randomize 6:1 ratio receive 1 follow regimen : single intramuscular ( IM ) injection VIVITROL administer every 4 week oral naltrexone 50 mg administer daily .
DOC.brief_title: ALK21-006 : Long-Term Study Medisorb® Naltrexone ( VIVITROL® )
DOC.detailed_description: Safety evaluation include physical examination , electrocardiogram ( ECGs ) , laboratory measure ( include plasma concentration naltrexone 6β-naltrexol ) , assessments injection site , adverse event ( AEs ) . All subject receive psychosocial support study visit duration study , interim telephone contact 2 week monthly visit .
